Posts.Content: Teild wrote: Just from a common sense point of view, chemo weakens the body and the immune system?  With a weakened immune system, can't that help cancer spread?  Its such a tough decision to know whether chemo is beneficial or not.  Anybody know of any studies that consider this issue? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Any chance Chemo spreads cancer? Teild KKing
